classroom.name: classroom
classroom.description: You're in a lecture hall, for some reason.

exits.description: A door leads into the hall.
You see a light in the distance.

hallway.name: hallway
hallway.description: This is a hallway with many locked doors.

exits.description: Go back into the lecture hall.
A door with the words STAIRS is stuck open.
Nevermind; go back to the hallway.
A door at the bottom of the stairs has a red, glowing, EXIT sign.

bathroom.name: bathroom
bathroom.description: You're in the bathroom. You had to go.

exits.description: Go back into the lecture hall.

basement.name: basement
basement.description: You've found yourself in the scary basement. Uh oh.
